Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone. Is there a way to hyperlink to an external site?

For example, if the narrative reads, "Though most outsiders have disregarded the eerie reports..." can the words eerie reports be made a hyperlink that opens up a new window or tab and a different Website?

Thanks, T.
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone. Is there a way to hyperlink to an external site?

For example, if the narrative reads, "Though most outsiders have disregarded the eerie reports..." can the words eerie reports be made a hyperlink that opens up a new window or tab and a different Website?

Thanks, T.

Posts.EditableText:
There is no special text processor notation, but you can always use HTML. For example, you can put this in your room description or in a print message:

[code:5pctmv3a]Though most outsiders have disregarded the <a href="http://tinyurl.com/pe98wke">eerie reports</a>...[/code:5pctmv3a]
Posts.HTML:
There is no special text processor notation, but you can always use HTML. For example, you can put this in your room description or in a print message:

Though most outsiders have disregarded the <a href="http://tinyurl.com/pe98wke">eerie reports</a>...
